trans-unit.source: Enables the use of a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 启用的自定义使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>实现从一台计算机或应用程序配置文件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: You should derive from the BindingElementExtensionElement class to use a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> implementation from a machine or application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应派生自要使用自定义的 BindingElementExtensionElement 类<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>实现从一台计算机或应用程序配置文件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Once a BindingElementExtensionElement instance has been created, a custom binding element is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建 BindingElementExtensionElement 实例后，会返回一个自定义绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: You can use this in an application configuration file by using the <`add`> element and setting the type attribute to the BindingElementExtensionElement class, and the name attribute to the custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在使用此应用程序配置文件使用`add`1> 元素和设置的类型属性设为 BindingElementExtensionElement 类，并为自定义绑定元素的名称属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement"></xref> class.
Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的绑定元素的内容应用到此绑定配置元素。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents the custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref:System.Type>表示自定义绑定元素的对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Override and implement the BindingElementType property to return the type of the custom binding element this <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement> associates with the configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 重写并实现 BindingElementType 属性以返回自定义绑定元素的类型此<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement>将与配置系统相关联。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BindingElementExtensionElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the custom binding type.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a custom binding element object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，则返回一个自定义绑定元素对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的绑定元素的内容与此绑定配置节。
